item.dc:creator: @kamarscape kamarscape
item.description:
@kamarscape wrote:

Server sided
Censor removed
You can no longer trade in dungeoneering
Fixed the wilderness at some areas at revenants
Friends login & logout display fixed
Ironman can now access the nomadshop
Chaos elemental health nerfed

item.source: * | Ironman | Unique features | Stable Economy and much more!

item.title: * | Ironman | Unique features | Stable Economy and much more!
item.dc:creator: @kamarscape kamarscape
item.description:
@kamarscape wrote:

Fixing firing the cannon when a slayer level is required
Eating timers reduced by 0.2 seconds (200 ms).
Forum BG
Ironman players now have the ironman icon on the hiscores.
Throwing snowballs at players
Fixed Ava’s accumulator/attractor, they will now correctly save ammo.
Farming - normal time for crops/trees/etc. to grow, the higher your rank, the faster they grow.
Fix accessing the client for some people

This will come in the next update.

Fishing - make it so fishing spots disappear and re-appear (to prevent power-fishing, leveling up too easily)
Iron Man accounts will have the ability to access Nomad’s shop.
Add a bank booth at the Summoning training teleport
Friends login & logout display fixed
Made Tzhaar area a multi-combat zone
Censor removed
When someone buys a max cape, there will be a global message (e.g. “Divine has just bought the Max Cape, congratulations!”)

Read full topic

item.source: * | Ironman | Unique features | Stable Economy and much more!

item.title: * | Ironman | Unique features | Stable Economy and much more!
item.dc:creator: @kamarscape kamarscape
item.description:
@kamarscape wrote:

Fire making (Ring of Fire & Flame Gloves)
Players have a 3% chance while firemaking to obtain any of the 2 pieces. Players can collect multiple pieces and/or sets.
Effect: Players have a 10% chance to put up to 3 logs into a bonfire in a single action, if both items are worn. If possible, the player can right-click the logs and automatically light it (Without a tinderbox), if the player is wearing the Flame Gloves.Finally, the player earns additional experience if both items are worn.

Herblore & Hunter (Witchdoctor Clothing) -
Players have a 3% chance while making potions or Hunting (Red Chinchompa, Ninja, Dragon & Kingly) to obtain any of the 3 pieces Players can collect multiple pieces and/or sets.
Effect (Herblore) - Players have a 10% chance to create 4-dose potions instead of 3-dose. Players also have a 10% chance to create multiple potions in a single action, up to 4, if the f ull set is worn. Finally, the player has a slight increase in experience, if the full set is worn.
Effect (Hunter) - Players have a +10% increased chance at capturing Hunting NPC’s, as well as a 10% chance to capture multiple in a single action, up to 4, if the full set is worn. Finally, the player has a slight increase in experience, if the full set is worn.

Mining (Golden Mining Suit & Inferno Adze)
Players have a 3% chance while mining (1% for mining the Crashed Star) to obtain any of the 5 pieces of Golden Mining Suit or the Inferno Adze. Players can collect multiple pieces and/or sets.
Effect (Golden Mining Suit): Players have a 10% chance to mine multiple ores in a single action, up to 4, if the full set is worn. Also, the player earns additional experience, if the full set is worn.
Effect (Inferno Adze) - Players have a 10% chance to automatically smelt the ore (Excluding Coal), receiving smithing experience. This ability can be toggled off or no by operating the item.

Woodcutting (Lumberjack Outfit & Inferno Adze)
Players have a 3% chance while woodcutting to obtain any of the 4 pieces of Lumberjack Outfit or the Inferno Adze. Players can collect multiple pieces and/or sets.
Effect (Lumberjack outfit): Players have a 10% chance to cut multiple logs in a single action, up to 4, if the full set is worn. Players also have a +3% increase to obtain Bird’s Nest with eggs in them. Also, the player earns additional experience, if the full set is worn.
Effect (Inferno Adze) - Players have a 10% chance to automatically light the log, earning Firemaking experience. This can be toggled off or no by operating the item.

fixed the runecrafter robe
fixed the golden mining outfit
ROWW4SO.png
Players have a 3% chance while Runecrafting to obtain any of the 3 pieces of Master Runecrafting outfit. Players can collect multiple pieces and/or sets.
Effect (Master Runecrafting Outfit): Players have a 7% chance to create double or triple the amount of runes that the player would normally make. Also, the player earns additional experience, if the full set is worn.

Read full topic

Added potion shop
Fixed gembags
Added stardust shop (more items coming, like goldmining)
200M Capes fixed
Fishing - made it so fishing spots disappear and re-appear
Added more Character skin colors
Fixed plat and diamond droprate
Thieving - reduced the cash you get when selling the thieving items
Mining - made a ore re-spawn timer
Herblore - when using herbs on a vial of water, made a menu pop up with “make 1, 5, 10, X” , same for
when using a secondary on a potion (unf
Christmas scythe
You can now use Iron arrows with shortbow / Longbow.
Divine will no longer drain prayer for gold members
Increase the rare drop table drop rate on Ring of Wealth
Fixed playercount issue
Snow added, and snowflake
